PLACEHOLDER.CRITERIA: Filter by brand, category, features or keywords...

TOP.TEXT:
You can search an item by:
  • brand (Angelic Pretty, BABY THE STARS SHINE BRIGHT...),
  • category (jumperskirts, socks, underwear...),
  • color (Pink, Gold, Sax...),
  • feature (Full back shirring, scalloped, Peter Pan collar...)
  • or even keywords (Sugary carnival, bunny, cookie...).
You can always add more criteria to your search by clicking on the search bar and continuing to type.

Tip: Type "My items" to display only the items you have created.

ITEM.REQUIRED_TEXT: Fields marked with an * are mandatory.
ITEM.DELETE_PARAGRAPH:
Do you really want to delete this item?
This action is definitive and cannot be undone.
To delete the item copy paste the identifier in the field below: "{{id}}"

NOT_FOUND.FEATURES:
No features related
to the selected category

HELPS.PHOTO:
In order to limit the weight of our images, it is better to put the URL of the item picture you can find on Google.
If you want to use personal pictures, you just have to host them, using a photo hosting website (such as SmugMug, Google Photos, Flickr Pro, Imgur...)
Please try to provide the best quality pictures as possible.
Thank you:)
HELPS.COLLECTION:
Hint: sometimes brands release items of differents colors under a same name.
Not all the brands do that, so you don‚Äôt have to fill this field if the item doesn‚Äôt belong to any collection.

For example:
Toy Doll Box (Angelic Pretty)

The World's Most Adorable Dog and the World's Most Delicious Strawberry Frappe (Baby, The Stars Shine Bright)

Also, as you can notice it might be long to write.
HELPS.ADDITONALS: These fields here are not mandatory, if you have the details you can fill in the fields, if you don‚Äôt, it‚Äôs okay, other member can edit them later.
HELPS.KEYWORDS:
Here you can type pattern keywords, you can add severals ones!
Type "Christmas" if it is a Christmas themed dress,
Type "bunnies" if you see cute bunnies on the skirt,
Type "cherries" if there are cherries on these shoes...
It is simple!
Make sure that each keyword is validated with a border to separate them.
That will help the members to find their dream dresses, with a pattern only composed of cats! (Which are evil creatures, as a reminder...)
HELPS.SUBSTYLES:
This allows you fellows lolita friends to find easier the items matching their personality!
You can add several of course, a Valentine's Day theme can be sweet, a dress can be both military and circus etc.

Just keep in mind that it will help everyone to have more relevent researches.

HELPS.USEFUL:
The Coordination Checklist is here to help you to coordinate your outfit!
Click on each category to choose the item from your closet.

Whether you are a baby lolita or an advanced lolita, I'm sure it will be helpful to you!

You can use this tool if you are busy with many upcoming events or if you simply like dressing up at home and remember your coordinations for later. You can give titles to your coord, add a date or a theme, It will be useful to anticipate any event you are invited to, it will also help you remembering the progress you‚Äôve made in coord construction. Furthermore, it can be used as a reminder to know what you are going to buy next to complete your coord!

You don‚Äôt have to be home next to your closet!
You just need a wi-fi and your lovely closet (that you put on My Everyday Lolita and kept updated, right?) so that you can work on your coords anywhere anytime!

You have no idea how to coordinate a piece?

Have a look at the Coord Helper!

You can use the memo field to write down what you need to take to a specific event.
We sometimes regret to have forgotten a second pair of shoes, or a bigger bag (these lolita bags are so small...so cute for pictures but SOOOO SMALLL). Anyways: write down anything you want!

You can share your coord with your friends and ask them for constructive criticism...or not! (For real, I‚Äôm not a juge here, you can do whatever you want, I‚Äôm already so happy you‚Äôre here üíï)

ABOUT_US:
‚ÄòWho is behind this app?‚Äô You may wonder!
My Everyday Lolita is made by a lolita for lolitas!
For real, we are two French people, a couple.

Lheido is a professional web developer, he conceived the entire front-end and back-end of my-everyday-lolita, which is a huge job. (he has to make the design work, securise the whole account system, make things work etc.). So, yeah, without him, there is nothing.
I am Rockuu, and I made the design of the app, every little drawing you see and I try to handle the communication around the app. I also wrote the English version and translated it into French.

On the contrary to my loved one, I am not a professional of these domains, therefore, I ask for your kindness.

We made this app in our free time, with our own budget, just to share the love of lolita fashion. ‚ï∞(*¬¥Ô∏∂`*)‚ïØ

I am not a professional artist, I have no formation whatsoever. I tried to do something cute and I really hope my work is not hurtful to any artist.

I am not what you can call an ‚Äúadvanced lolita‚Äù just an enthusiast, I hope my work is relevant though. I‚Äôve been practising lolita fashion on my own for about 8 years.

ABOUT_PROJECT:
This project was born in February 2021.
Unfortunately, I was jobless at that time, I was spending my time on lolita websites, trying to handle my closet and wishlist using pictures on my computer / albums on Facebook or using websites. I was really struggling! My boyfriend offered to make an app for me‚Ä¶!
I thought it was a joke but...here we are!

CHILDREN:
We are perfectly aware that other apps and websites exist to do this, if you prefer them, that is okay! (‚åíœâ‚åí) However, at that moment it did not correspond to my needs.

Some random examples:

ITEMS: One can‚Äôt add an item with one color to the wishlist and the same item of another color to the closet at the same time
One can‚Äôt see the color chosen in one's closet, only the ‚Äúdefault‚Äù color is displayed
One can‚Äôt classify or filter elements already present in one's wishlist or closet
One can‚Äôt have an idea of the total amount of money or the total of items present in one's closet or wishlist
One can‚Äôt create coordination, or can but as it is not precisely made for lolitas, it is messy
One can‚Äôt have a visual hint in case the item is already in one‚Äôs wishlist or closet
One can‚Äôt filter or search by style (could be useful if one only search for gothic items for example)
Some types of items are not handled (wigs, plush‚Ä¶)
Some brands are not taken into account (indie brands, Taobao brands‚Ä¶)
One can't always see or display the measurements of an item
One can‚Äôt add (or can't add easily) it‚Äôs own item if it is not referenced on the app
Some fashion apps are good but are not made for lolitas...some features are hence missing

CHILDREN:
Maybe you will find other issues
‚îê(Ôø£„ÉòÔø£)‚îå

ABOUT_PROJECT:
Obviously, we admire the work of the already existing apps and websites, they do an amazing job and are a source of inspiration for all of us.
We just wanted to do things our own way.
Of course, we will not pretend we can do better but we do try our best to correct the issues and to build something that will correspond to the needs of many people.
To improve our work even more, we are open to suggestions.
For technical reasons, we can‚Äôt put in place everything, but we will do our best! (¬∞‚ñΩ¬∞)/
With My Everyday Lolita (MEL for short) you can do three main things:

ITEMS:
Organize your closet
You can add items to your closet by searching them in the Search menu, or add your own items if they have not been created yet. You can filter by categories these items if you want to see only the dresses, only the accessories etc.
For short: ‚ÄòMy closet‚Äô is the perfect place to have an overview of your real closet wherever you are!

Organize your wishlist
As in 'My Closet', in 'My Wishlist' you can add items you wish to have using the Search menu, you can then share your wishlist with people (so that they‚Äôll know what to offer you
(Ôø¢‚ÄøÔø¢ ))
You can simultaneously have an item from one color in your closet and the same item with another color to your wishlist. You can also filter your wishlist to display different items such as brands, categories...
For short: My wishlist is the menu where you can add every item you ever dream of!

Create your coordinations
The 'Coordination Checklist' is such a useful tool for lolitas. If you have an upcoming event (Tea party with friends? Or you just want to go out and be sure to look fantastic?), you can create a new coordination, name it, add any useful information. Basically do whatever you want. The point of this tool is to avoid forgetting any item as every category represents a ‚Äúnecessary item to wear or to bring‚Äù. You don‚Äôt have to fill every category of course. You can also use this tool to know what to buy in the future.Then, you can share a coordination to ask you friends what they think about it. Be free to make mistakes, without making a mess in your closet!
For short: You can anticipate your lolita life with the Coord Checklist and make progress!

ABOUT_PROJECT: Whether you are a debutant lolita or an experienced lolita, I hope this will be useful!

Watch the first video I made for the app to explain everything:
=> Link to YouTube Video

It‚Äôs an open source project, totally free to use! Available on Android and iOS..
The serveur costs us fees every month, we want to spread the word as widely as possible, but the more users there are on our app, the more costly it becomes.
If you are able to support us and want to do it, you can go to our Patreon here: Patreon
